title: WATCH & VOTE: Best backheel goal
description: After Alexandre Lacazette, Mame Biram Diouf and Willian all scored brilliant backheel goals on the weekend, we want you to tell us which was your favourite.
content: Mesut Ozil combined with Jack Wilshere, who then backheel for Lacazette to rifle into the bottom corner in Arsenal's resounding 4-1 win over the Eagles at the Emirates on the weekend.Xherdan Shaqiri and Diouf combined for the latter to slot beyond Jonas Lossl via the post to help Paul Lambert get off to a winning start as the new Potters head coach at the Bet 365.The Brazil international was involved in some slick interplay with Eden Hazard and Michy Batshuayi, leaving the Brighton defence all at sea before expertly finishing past Mat Ryan as the champions got back to winnings ways with a 4-0 win at the Amex.Now, all three of those wonder goals contained either a flick or a back heel, however, which was the best? Well, you decide by voting belowâ€¦
dbpedia: Mesut Ozil combined with Jack Wilshere, who then backheel for Lacazette to rifle into the bottom corner in Arsenal\'s resounding 4-1 win over the Eagles at the Emirates on the weekend.Xherdan Shaqiri and Diouf combined for the latter to slot beyond Jonas Lossl via the post to help Paul Lambert get off to a winning start as the new Potters head coach at the Bet 365.The Brazil international was involved in some slick interplay with Eden Hazard and Michy Batshuayi, leaving the Brighton defence all at sea before expertly finishing past Mat Ryan as the champions got back to winnings ways with a 4-0 win at the Amex.Now, all three of those wonder goals contained either a flick or a back heel, however, which was the best? Well, you decide by voting below…
